Class ConcreteModelProxy

java.lang.Object
healthyBites.model.ConcreteModelProxy
All Implemented Interfaces:
Model
public class ConcreteModelProxy extends Object implements Model
Proxy that wraps ConcreteModel object to monitor performance log.
